name: Layaway
description: We now offer layaway for just $20 (nonrefundable fee)To start your layaway today email us extendedbeauty1@gmail.com or call us at 310-425-3569

name: Pretty Peruvian
description:
100% Virgin hair of 5A quality which is the best. Tangle free, no shedding due to a double machine weft. Soft to the touch and able to be dyed, permed and flat ironed. Custom color available as well as lengths offered from 12 -40 inches. Available in straight, body wave, loose wave, curly and loose curl. Hair can last up to 12 months or more if given proper care by washing and conditioning regularly.

***ANYTHING ABOVE 30 INCHES SEND AN EMAIL FOR PRICE INQUIRY***PRICES SUBJECT TO CHANGE***

Virgin hair is sold by weight each bundle will be 100kg or 4-5 ounces so the longer the hair the shorter track so for best results for a full head use:

2 bundles for 18 inches and under

3 bundles for 18-30 inches

4-5 for 30 inches and above

All orders will be shipped through the U.S.P.S.
Expedited shipping available request via email.
